Room.Name: Short Valley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a short, wooded valley in the Enchanted Forest.
Room.LongDescription: the trees are not very thick here in the valley, but they are strange. Each one seems to have a door and windows cut into it, and some very small people apparently live here. There is a stream near the western edge of the valley, and several of the small folk are setting fish nets. A lilting music seems to pervade the valley, although faintly. The path you are on continues north and south. An almost unseen path heads west.
